typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Prop_0 as string,
		Prop_1 as string,
		Prop_2 as string,
		Prop_3 as string,
		Prop_4 as string,
		Prop_5 as string,
		Prop_6 as string,
		Prop_7 as string,
		Prop_8 as string,
		Prop_9 as string,
		Prop_10 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'raw',
	folderPath: 'ecdc/cases_deaths',
	fileName: 'cases_deaths.csv',
	columnDelimiter: '\t',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> CasesAndDeathsSource
